Experience: Worked on a platform for private data in the cloud and on several applied cryptography projects focusing on cloud computing security.

Studied techniques for the efficient verication of data integrity and computations correctness in adversarial environments (e.g., cloud), by employing advanced cryptographic methods (beyond hashing). Proposed several new authenticated data structures for fundamental algorithmics and computation problems such as hash table queries and set operations. Implemented authenticated storage systems (e.g., Athos and authenticated Amazon S3). Side projects included algorithms for metric embeddings and sensor networks.

Worked on the CS2 cryptographic cloud storage system that guarantees condentiality, integrity and verifiability, combined. Developed a new construction for dynamic searchable symmetric encryption that satisfies the strongest notion of security (CKA-2) and at the same time is I/O efficient.
